name: LocationReminder
0:
”Alexa, open location reminder?”
”Where did I put headphones?”
”I put headphones in Closet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: location reminder
des: Have you ever put something somewhere and then later been unable to remember where you put it? Don't you wish you had told someone where you put it? Well, now you do! "Where did I put it?" stores the location you put something in, and retrieves it when requested to do so. Never lose anything again!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
